title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง 8.2 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง 8.2 - Application

State Regulations

Any person who manufactures or proposes to manufacture
cheddar, washed curd or colby cheese in New York State may apply for an
identification stamp or stencil to be used in marking such cheese in lieu of
marking such cheese with his name and address. Application for such stamps or
stencils shall be made on a form prescribed by the commissioner. Such
application shall be made, if possible, at least 30 days prior to the date when
the applicant desires to commence the use of such stamps or
stencils. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง
8.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
